review: Dr. Vimal was perfectly explained and addressed the issue I was facing , he even showed me bone structure photos to explain all these. Unlike other doctors, he said it clearly no test or medicine would help just only rest, though just for my satisfaction he recommended 2 medicines also explained their functions. He gave his phone number, if I face any further issues I can contact him. He is very genuine and I would highly recommend him.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words.

reply_text: Thank you mam, for your kind words.

reply_text:
Dear patient,
As you mentioned your detailed history of full sedentary lifestyle from past 3 months, and after my examination,it was a lifestyle related problems and required physical activities more than painkillers,so we mostly advised vitamins and health supplements.
Your apprehension,I understand,but from past more than 3 months,we wear PPE for hours during operations of lengthy surgeries in hospital ot,but for OPD government recommendations are mainly social distancing and hand washing and sanatizers and disinfecting space that we do regularly, and till now zero count of covid at our facility.
Most welcome üòä for follow up .
Thank you for your valuable input üòä.
